{{Exclusive|java}}

'''Mob variants''' are variants of [[mob]]s. They define the assets and models used and define the conditions in which this variant spawns.

== Definition ==

Mob variants can be defined in [[data pack]]s, as part of the directory structure below.

<div class="treeview">
*{{File|archive|''data pack name''.zip}} or {{File|directory|''data pack name''}}
**{{File|file|[[#pack.mcmeta|pack.mcmeta]]}}
**{{File|directory|data}}
***{{File|directory|''namespace''}}
****{{File|directory|'''cat_variant'''}}
*****{{File|file|'''{{ph|name}}.json'''}}
****{{File|directory|'''chicken_variant'''}}
*****{{File|file|'''{{ph|name}}.json'''}}
****{{File|directory|'''cow_variant'''}}
*****{{File|file|'''{{ph|name}}.json'''}}
****{{File|directory|'''frog_variant'''}}
*****{{File|file|'''{{ph|name}}.json'''}}
****{{File|directory|'''pig_variant'''}}
*****{{File|file|'''{{ph|name}}.json'''}}
****{{File|directory|'''wolf_variant'''}}
*****{{File|file|'''{{ph|name}}.json'''}}
****{{File|directory|'''zombie_nautilus_variant'''}}
*****{{File|file|'''{{ph|name}}.json'''}}
****[[Data pack#Folder_structure|More directories&hellip;]]
</div>

== JSON Format ==
=== Cat ===
'''[[Cat]] variants''' are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|string|asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use.
** {{nbt|string|baby_asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the baby texture to use.{{upcoming|First Drop 2026}}
** {{nbt|list|spawn_conditions}}: The spawn conditions of this variant, see {{slink||Spawn condition}}
</div>
=== Chicken ===
'''[[Chicken]] variants''' are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|string|asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use.
** {{nbt|string|baby_asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the baby texture to use.{{upcoming|First Drop 2026}}
** {{nbt|string|model}}: The chicken model to use. Has to be {{cd|normal}} or {{cd|cold}}.
** {{nbt|list|spawn_conditions}}: The spawn conditions of this variant, see {{slink||Spawn condition}}
</div>
=== Cow ===
'''[[Cow]] variants''' are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|string|asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use.
** {{nbt|string|baby_asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the baby texture to use.{{upcoming|First Drop 2026}}
** {{nbt|string|model}}: The cow model to use. Has to be {{cd|normal}}, {{cd|cold}} or {{cd|warm}}
** {{nbt|list|spawn_conditions}}: The spawn conditions of this variant, see {{slink||Spawn condition}}
</div>
=== Frog ===
'''[[Frog]] variants''' are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|string|asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use.
** {{nbt|list|spawn_conditions}}: The spawn conditions of this variant, see {{slink||Spawn condition}}
</div>
=== Pig ===
'''[[Pig]] variants''' are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|string|asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use.
** {{nbt|string|baby_asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the baby texture to use.{{upcoming|First Drop 2026}}
** {{nbt|string|model}}: The pig model to use, has to be {{cd|normal}} or {{cd|cold}}. Defaults to {{cd|normal}}
** {{nbt|list|spawn_conditions}}: The spawn conditions of this variant, see {{slink||Spawn condition}}
</div>
=== Wolf ===
'''[[Wolf]] variants''' are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|compound|assets}}: The assets to use for this variant:
***{{nbt|string|angry}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use when the wolf is angry.
***{{nbt|string|wild}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use when the wolf is wild.
***{{nbt|string|tame}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use when the wolf is tamed.
** {{nbt|compound|baby_assets}}: The assets to use for the baby of this variant:{{Upcoming|First Drop 2026}}
***{{nbt|string|angry}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use when the wolf is angry.
***{{nbt|string|wild}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use when the wolf is wild.
***{{nbt|string|tame}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use when the wolf is tamed.
** {{nbt|list|spawn_conditions}}: The spawn conditions of this variant, see {{slink||Spawn condition}}
</div>
=== Wolf sounds ===
'''[[Wolf]] sound variants''' are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|ambient_sound}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}}
*** {{nbt inherit/sound event}}
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|death_sound}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}}
*** {{nbt inherit/sound event}}
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|growl_sound}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}}
*** {{nbt inherit/sound event}}
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|hurt_sound}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}}
*** {{nbt inherit/sound event}}
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|pant_sound}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}}
*** {{nbt inherit/sound event}}
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|whine_sound}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}}
*** {{nbt inherit/sound event}}
</div>
=== Zombie Nautilus ===
'''[[Zombie nautilus]] variants''' are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|string|asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] of the texture to use.
** {{nbt|string|model}}: The nautilus model to use, has to be {{cd|normal}} or {{cd|warm}}. Defaults to {{cd|normal}}
** {{nbt|list|spawn_conditions}}: The spawn conditions of this variant, see {{slink||Spawn condition}}
</div>

== Spawn condition ==
Spawn conditions are used to determine which variant to spawn. Each variant contains a list of conditions with attached priorities. The selection of a variant happens in 3 steps:
# Each condition is evaluated. The matching condition with the highest priority determines the priority of the variant. If no condition matches the variant is discarded.
# Of all remaining variants, all except those with the highest priority are discarded.
# Of the remaining variants, a random variant is chosen.

Spawn conditions are specified using the following format:

<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|list|spawn_conditions}}: List of spawn conditions with priority
** {{nbt|compound}}: A single spawn condition
*** {{nbt|int|priority}}: The priority of the variant if this spawn condition matches
*** {{nbt|compound|condition}}: Condition to match. Always matches if omitted
**** {{nbt|string|type}}: The type of the condition, see below for valid options
**** Additional fields based on {{nbt|string|type}}, see below
</div>

=== biome ===
Tests if the spawn position is inside one of the specified [[biome]]s.
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|condition}}
** {{nbt|string|type}}: {{cd|biome}}
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|list|biomes}}: {{json_ref/biome|tag=1}} &mdash; The biomes to match
</div>

=== structure ===
Tests if the spawn position is inside at least one of the specified [[structure]]s.
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|condition}}
** {{nbt|string|type}}: {{cd|structure}}
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|list|structures}}: {{json_ref/structure|tag=1}} &mdash; The structures to match
</div>

=== moon_brightness ===
Matches the [[moon]] brightness at the time of the spawn.
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|condition}}
** {{nbt|string|type}}: {{cd|moon_brightness}}
** {{nbt|double}}{{nbt|compound|range}}: The moon brightness values to match &mdash; If specified as {{nbt|double}}: matches a single moon brightness value
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: The minimum moon brightness to match
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: The maximum moon brightness to match
</div>
